data.text:
『――And that concludes our special about the 
Oka Sho next week! Upon whose head will the 
cherry blossom crown shine? Don't miss it!』
data.name: Street Billboard
data.processed:
<story>『――And that concludes our special about the 
<story>Oka Sho next week! Upon whose head will the 
<story>cherry blossom crown shine? Don't miss it!』

data.text:
Oh man, I'm really looking forward to it~……! For this distance, 
won't it be Rhein Kraft? No, Cesario's pretty good too though……!
data.name: Passerby A
data.processed:
<story>Oh man, I'm really looking forward to it~……! For this distance, 
<story>won't it be Rhein Kraft? No, Cesario's pretty good too though……!

data.text:
And there'll be a bunch of other powerful Uma Musume 
showing up too-! This year's Tiara generation, who's 
going to take the lead? ……I really want to know~!
data.name: Passerby B
data.processed:
<story>And there'll be a bunch of other powerful Uma Musume 
<story>showing up too-! This year's Tiara generation, who's 
<story>going to take the lead? ……I really want to know~!

data.text:
(……the Triple Tiara's first battlefield, 1600m, the 『Oka Sho』. 
A race where so many Uma Musume have competed using their speed)
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>(……the Triple Tiara's first battlefield, 1600m, the 『Oka Sho』. 
<story>A race where so many Uma Musume have competed using their speed)

data.text:
(That race with an Uma Musume who was part of an 
"Impressive Clan"……was amazing. And that speed that 
Nishino Flower-san showed is still burned in to my memory)
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>(That race with an Uma Musume who was part of an 
<story>"Impressive Clan"……was amazing. And that speed that 
<story>Nishino Flower-san showed is still burned in to my memory)

data.text:
(The Nigawa stage where cherry blossoms dance, 
the place I've always admired, where many have 
run before me……but, finally, it's my turn)
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>(The Nigawa stage where cherry blossoms dance, 
<story>the place I've always admired, where many have 
<story>run before me……but, finally, it's my turn)

data.text:
It's my turn to run. 
……It's my turn to win!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>It's my turn to run. 
<story>……It's my turn to win!

data.text:
『Hi, Mama? ――Wait, let me guess. "Make sure you 
win the Oka Sho!" That's your message right?』
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed:
<story>『Hi, Mama? ――Wait, let me guess. "Make sure you 
<story>win the Oka Sho!" That's your message right?』

data.text:
『Eh, plus "Have fun"? Ahaa, of course! 
I've never ever thought of a race as boring!』
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed:
<story>『Eh, plus "Have fun"? Ahaa, of course! 
<story>I've never ever thought of a race as boring!』

data.text:
『……Yeah ……Yeah, I said I'll be fine. ……Sorry Mama, 
I need to get back to training. I'll call you again!』
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed:
<story>『……Yeah ……Yeah, I said I'll be fine. ……Sorry Mama, 
<story>I need to get back to training. I'll call you again!』

data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed: <story>Bye.　…………

data.text:
Goal!! It was close, it was an incredibly close 1st place 
for Rhein Kraft! Rhein Kraft wins the 『Fillies' Review』!!
data.name: Live Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Goal!! It was close, it was an incredibly close 1st place 
<story>for Rhein Kraft! Rhein Kraft wins the 『Fillies' Review』!!

data.text: ――Aaaaaaaaaah!!
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed: <story>――Aaaaaaaaaah!!

data.text:
(By a head……by just a head! Honestly, I've imagined 
it so many times! Just one step, with just one more 
step, if I could have taken that one more step……!)
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed:
<story>(By a head……by just a head! Honestly, I've imagined 
<story>it so many times! Just one step, with just one more 
<story>step, if I could have taken that one more step……!)

data.text:
(『If only』, I know it's meaningless when it 
comes to races, but! This frustration, this 
regret, no matter how much I dwell on it――)
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed:
<story>(『If only』, I know it's meaningless when it 
<story>comes to races, but! This frustration, this 
<story>regret, no matter how much I dwell on it――)

data.text:
All of it! I can turn all of it in to strength……! 
Haaaaaaaaaa!!
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed:
<story>All of it! I can turn all of it in to strength……! 
<story>Haaaaaaaaaa!!

data.text:
Heart……s-she's really pushing herself……it's almost 
like she's possessed. I heard she's been working 
so hard she's been losing a lot of weight too……
data.name: Heart's Friend A
data.processed:
<story>Heart……s-she's really pushing herself……it's almost 
<story>like she's possessed. I heard she's been working 
<story>so hard she's been losing a lot of weight too……

data.text:
Yeah……it's more than I could have imagined…… 
Now it's a little hard to call out to her……
data.name: Heart's Friend B
data.processed:
<story>Yeah……it's more than I could have imagined…… 
<story>Now it's a little hard to call out to her……

data.text:
I will win, that's all. 
The 『Oka Sho』……the first Tiara, I'll be the one to take it……!
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed:
<story>I will win, that's all. 
<story>The 『Oka Sho』……the first Tiara, I'll be the one to take it……!

data.text:
(Heart-san, Kraft-san, Cesario-san. And the crown that many 
other indomitable Uma Musume have sought, the Triple Tiara)
data.name: Air Messiah
data.processed:
<story>(Heart-san, Kraft-san, Cesario-san. And the crown that many 
<story>other indomitable Uma Musume have sought, the Triple Tiara)

data.text:
――But I won't hand it over. To anyone. 
The glory of that tiara, never. No matter who.
data.name: Air Messiah
data.processed:
<story>――But I won't hand it over. To anyone. 
<story>The glory of that tiara, never. No matter who.

data.text:
Only 3 races. All of them are a once-in-a-lifetime chance. 
That's why I'll do anything in my power to obtain it……!
data.name: Air Messiah
data.processed:
<story>Only 3 races. All of them are a once-in-a-lifetime chance. 
<story>That's why I'll do anything in my power to obtain it……!

data.text:
My goal……my dream. 
Can only be fulfilled by doing so……!
data.name: Air Messiah
data.processed:
<story>My goal……my dream. 
<story>Can only be fulfilled by doing so……!

data.text:
Haa, haaa……!! 
How was it……!?
data.name: Air Messiah
data.processed:
<story>Haa, haaa……!! 
<story>How was it……!?

data.text: ……――no change.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>……――no change.

data.text:
The numbers have improved since we've started. 
However, there have also been some changes input in 
to the calculations. ……the final result has not changed.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>The numbers have improved since we've started. 
<story>However, there have also been some changes input in 
<story>to the calculations. ……the final result has not changed.

data.text:
……Please, state it more clearly, Shakur-san. 
I am already prepared.
data.name: Air Messiah
data.processed:
<story>……Please, state it more clearly, Shakur-san. 
<story>I am already prepared.

data.text:
Tsk…… 
……The 『Oka Sho』. Your predicted results are――
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Tsk…… 
<story>……The 『Oka Sho』. Your predicted results are――

data.text: Top 5. ……Victory is not possible.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>Top 5. ……Victory is not possible.

data.text:
……Thank you very much. If that's what senpai's 
calculations have resulted in then――that must be true.
data.name: Air Messiah
data.processed:
<story>……Thank you very much. If that's what senpai's 
<story>calculations have resulted in then――that must be true.

data.text:
In other words, it'll end in an 『Unfortunate』 result, 
is what you're saying. ……Just like my mother.
data.name: Air Messiah
data.processed:
<story>In other words, it'll end in an 『Unfortunate』 result, 
<story>is what you're saying. ……Just like my mother.

data.text:
Ha. But things have changed so little, it's almost yawn-inducing. 
――You could almost call it the curse of fate, huh?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Ha. But things have changed so little, it's almost yawn-inducing. 
<story>――You could almost call it the curse of fate, huh?

data.text: No, it's a blessing. Or perhaps a relief.
data.name: Air Messiah
data.processed: <story>No, it's a blessing. Or perhaps a relief.

data.text: ……Huh?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>……Huh?

data.text:
I am already aware of it. The evaluations of others. 
And that I'm very similar to my mother. Sincerity and a 
steady disposition――I have nothing that sets me apart.
data.name: Air Messiah
data.processed:
<story>I am already aware of it. The evaluations of others. 
<story>And that I'm very similar to my mother. Sincerity and a 
<story>steady disposition――I have nothing that sets me apart.

data.text:
And when faced with someone who has something 
『Special』, I face defeat. One step away from 
true glory. ……Because you say it's like that.
data.name: Air Messiah
data.processed:
<story>And when faced with someone who has something 
<story>『Special』, I face defeat. One step away from 
<story>true glory. ……Because you say it's like that.

data.text:
Because I'm so painfully similar, that's why I, 
that's why only I am able to clear away my mother's 
regrets. ……I think that's quite convenient.
data.name: Air Messiah
data.processed:
<story>Because I'm so painfully similar, that's why I, 
<story>that's why only I am able to clear away my mother's 
<story>regrets. ……I think that's quite convenient.

data.text: ……how stubborn. Or, rather, frank.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>……how stubborn. Or, rather, frank.

data.text:
I believe that's also from my mother. 
Could I ask you to accompany me for just a little bit longer?
data.name: Air Messiah
data.processed:
<story>I believe that's also from my mother. 
<story>Could I ask you to accompany me for just a little bit longer?

data.text: ………………Ahhh-, damnit.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>………………Ahhh-, damnit.

data.text:
We're wasting time. Just hurry up and get started. 
I'll say it now, but I'll be using the data that 
I collect however I feel like it, got it?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>We're wasting time. Just hurry up and get started. 
<story>I'll say it now, but I'll be using the data that 
<story>I collect however I feel like it, got it?

data.text:
Yes, please do! 
……Thank you very much, Shakur-san.
data.name: Air Messiah
data.processed:
<story>Yes, please do! 
<story>……Thank you very much, Shakur-san.

data.text:
And so the days passed――April 10th had arrived, a sunny 
day where the cherry blossoms danced. The first leg of 
the Triple Tiara, the 『Oka Sho』, would finally begin.
data.processed:
<story>And so the days passed――April 10th had arrived, a sunny 
<story>day where the cherry blossoms danced. The first leg of 
<story>the Triple Tiara, the 『Oka Sho』, would finally begin.

data.text:
The cherry blossom crown, I will be the one to obtain it. 
Please――watch me.
data.name: Air Messiah
data.processed:
<story>The cherry blossom crown, I will be the one to obtain it. 
<story>Please――watch me.

data.text:
Oooooh, they're here, they're here……! Rhein Kraft, Cesario, 
and Air Messiah! They're getting all the attention aren't they!?
data.name: Spectator A
data.processed:
<story>Oooooh, they're here, they're here……! Rhein Kraft, Cesario, 
<story>and Air Messiah! They're getting all the attention aren't they!?

data.text:
Yeah, sounds like they're calling it a battle 
between the 3 strongest! I wonder if one 
of them will win…… Kuu~ I can't wait~~!!
data.name: Spectator B
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, sounds like they're calling it a battle 
<story>between the 3 strongest! I wonder if one 
<story>of them will win…… Kuu~ I can't wait~~!!

data.text:
The 3 strongest, huh……I guess they've really 
stolen the show, huh. But, in that case――
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed:
<story>The 3 strongest, huh……I guess they've really 
<story>stolen the show, huh. But, in that case――

data.text:
For the real thing……with my run, 
I just need to overturn all of that!
data.name: Daring Heart
data.processed:
<story>For the real thing……with my run, 
<story>I just need to overturn all of that!

data.name: Cesario
data.processed: <story>――……Fuuu-……

data.text:
Cesario! ……congrats on your first run in your 
race outfit. It looks really good on you.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Cesario! ……congrats on your first run in your 
<story>race outfit. It looks really good on you.

data.text:
……Fu. 
Did you come all the way over here just to tell me that?
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>……Fu. 
<story>Did you come all the way over here just to tell me that?

data.text:
Fufuu, nope. 
……It does look really good on you though.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Fufuu, nope. 
<story>……It does look really good on you though.

data.text:
I won't let those sakura petals adorn you. 
I will win, Cesario.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>I won't let those sakura petals adorn you. 
<story>I will win, Cesario.

data.text:
Now you've said it. ……go ahead and run out in front all 
you want. In the end, I will undoubtedly catch you.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Now you've said it. ……go ahead and run out in front all 
<story>you want. In the end, I will undoubtedly catch you.

data.text:
It's a showdown, Rhein Kraft. 
The first tiara――I won't cede it to you!
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>It's a showdown, Rhein Kraft. 
<story>The first tiara――I won't cede it to you!
